quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Anonymous

quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
author: Robin Williams

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
author: Betty Reese

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The trouble is you think you have time.
author: Buddha

quote: I told my computer I needed a break, and now it won’t stop sending me error messages.
author: Anonymous

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: If you think you’re too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is short, smile while you still have teeth.
author: Anonymous

quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Anonymous

quote: You see, I am not a great man. I am a haberdasher.
author: Anonymous

quote: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: You're never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Just do it.
author: Nike

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
author: Tommy Cooper

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
author: Anonymous

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: I’m not lazy, I’m just on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Why don’t we tell secrets on a farm? Because the potatoes have eyes and the corn has ears!
author: Anonymous

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Actions speak louder than words, but not nearly as often.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: If you can't convince them, confuse them.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: When nothing goes right, go left.
author: Anonymous

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I am on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it.
author: Anonymous

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Gary Player

quote: I’m not short, I’m fun size!
author: Anonymous

quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone, and a funny bone.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I’m not too sure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: What’s the best thing about Switzerland? I don’t know, but the flag is a big plus.
author: Anonymous

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Why do they call it a building if it's already built?
author: Anonymous

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: A fortune teller told me I would come into money. I’m still waiting.
author: Anonymous

quote: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: Someone stole my Microsoft office and they will pay. You have my word!
author: Anonymous

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
author: Anonymous

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: The point is that you can’t ask life for anything if you haven’t got a smile on your face!
author: Anonymous

quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: To succeed, you must first believe that you can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: I don’t need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
author: Anonymous

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
author: Mikhail Gorbachev
